attributes.action: Re-nationalise Electricity and Gas companies to ensure lowest prices for all.
attributes.additional_details: The current and forthcoming huge price hikes on fuel which will affect the entire population.
attributes.background: Use the bulk buying power of the government to purchase electricity and gas at the lowest possible rates and ensure equality in the price people pay for energy in the near future.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Nationalise Energy Companies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608056
